footer.headerLink: City of Detroit - Housing and Revitalization Department
footer.forGeneralInquiries: For general program inquiries, you may call the City of Detroit HRD at (313) 224-6380.
footer.forListingQuestions: For listing and application questions, please contact the Property Agent displayed on each listing.

eligibility.welcomeInformation: To find you a home that best fits your needs, let's answer a few questions first. Some properties only accept people with certain ages, incomes, etc.
eligibility.bedroomCountPrompt: How many bedrooms do you need?
eligibility.agePromptDescription: Some properties only accept individuals over 62 years of age.
eligibility.disabilityDescription: Some properties are meant for residents with disabilities. Some homes might request proof of disability with your application.
